item.title: Another way to use your debugging tools
item.description: It’s Friday! And when it’s Friday and your computer is managed by Criteo, you have a chance to get this nice popup: It’s really nice to warn me that my computer is going to restart in a few hours. But it would be even better if the “Hide” button wasn’t grayed out. To make things better, the close button doesn’t work either, and the window is top-most. So the only choices you have is either to restart now or to spend the Friday with this window eating your precious screen real estate.
